sentences.en: Girls flowers, to pick Law, to fill a Sachet , really busy, the atmosphere is extremely active.

sentences.en: Golden Xiuyi jacket , Sachet Ribbon , both pairs of instant success.
sentences.cn: 金绣衣襦, 香囊结带, 双双对蹴.

sentences.en: I caught a faint odour of violet sachet.
sentences.cn: 我闻到一股紫罗兰香粉的淡淡的清香味儿.

sentences.en: In addition, sachet of garlic ( garlic Guduo ) is also a symbol of good fortune.
sentences.cn: 此外蒜头香包 ( 蒜骨朵 ) 亦是避邪的象征.

sentences.en: Inside sachet places the fruit of a medicinal cornel wears , but also has inserts in on.

sentences.en: Linglong fine, multicolored colorful appearance by QINGYANG Sachet, immediately aroused great interest in the participants.
sentences.cn: 玲珑精致 、 五彩斑斓的庆阳香包一经亮相, 立刻引起了与会者的浓厚兴趣.

sentences.en: Living sachet, censer for the bedroom.
sentences.cn: 从这活的香囊 、 卧室中的香炉.

sentences.en: Miss Li gave her sachet to Mr. Zheng as a token of love.
sentences.cn: 李小姐把随身配带的香囊送给郑公子当定情信物.

sentences.en: My lover is to me a sachet of myrrh resting between my breasts.
sentences.cn: 我以我的爱人为一口袋没药,昼夜不离地在我胸怀间.

sentences.en: One sachet daily, taken with empty stomach 15 minutes before breakfast. No diarrhea effect.
sentences.cn: 每日一包,于早餐前约15分钟空肚服食最佳, 绝无肚泻反应.

sentences.en: The air was heavy with the smell of stale grease paint, ointments, sachet.
sentences.cn: 空气里带着浓浓的走了味的油彩 、 油膏和香囊的气味.

sentences.en: The bedroom have a kettle with tea bag and sachet of instant coffee.
sentences.cn: 卧室里有茶壶、袋茶和速溶咖啡.

sentences.en: There is sachet shampoo in the bathroom.
sentences.cn: 浴室中有小袋包装的洗发水.

sentences.en: There was a sachet of shampoo in the bathroom.
When she sighed she exhaled a heavy perfume of sachet powder.
sentences.cn: 她叹息的时候,呼出浓重的香粉的香气.

trans.tran_en: a small plastic or paper package containing a liquid or powder
